testcase.failure:
java.lang.AssertionError: Expected: a string containing "Add Person" but: was " Action Not Found

Action Not Found

For request 'GET /'

These routes have been tried, in this order: 

        
          1
        
        
          
            POST
          
          
            /person
          
          
            controllers.PersonController.addPerson()
          
        
      
        
          2
        
        
          
            GET
          
          
            /persons
          
          
            controllers.PersonController.getPersons()
          
        
      
        
          3
        
        
          
            POST
          
          
            /login
          
          
            controllers.PersonController.login()
          
        
      
        
          4
        
        
          
            DELETE
          
          
            /delperson
          
          
            controllers.PersonController.deletePerson()
          
        
      
        
          5
        
        
          
            POST
          
          
            /action
          
          
            controllers.ActionController.addAction()
          
        
      
        
          6
        
        
          
            GET
          
          
            /actionprofile/$email<[^/]+>
          
          
            controllers.ActionController.getUserAction(email:String)
          
        
      
        
          7
        
        
          
            GET
          
          
            /actions
          
          
            controllers.ActionController.getActions()
          
        
      
        
          8
        
        
          
            GET
          
          
            /actionsf/$filter<[^/]+>
          
          
            controllers.ActionController.getActionsFilter(filter:String)
          
        
      
        
          9
        
        
          
            DELETE
          
          
            /delaction
          
          
            controllers.ActionController.deleteAction()
          
        
      
        
          10
        
        
          
            GET
          
          
            /assets/$file<.+>
          
          
            controllers.Assets.at(path:String = "/public", file:String)
